description:
Basara leads Mio to higher peaks as he pursues pleasure with the use of syrup.
With their master-servant pact reaching a new level, they both bring their full might to face the ones trying to eliminate Mio: Takashi and Kurumi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Am Ende von Liebe und Hass
Au-delà de l`amour et de la haine
The Depths of Love and Hatred
